title: House in Bella Vista - 705-11 Pemberton Street #711
description:
705-11 Pemberton Street #711 -- Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available. First, last and 1 month’s rent due when lease is signed.
Please reply by email with any questions, or to schedule a showing.
Jeff “City” Block

210 W. Rittenhouse Square
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath!
description:
Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath Graduate Hospital residence. Sun streams into the dramatic two-story living room, where a wood-burning fireplace is waiting to warm your winter days. Built-in bookshelves and excellent wall space for art complete the picture. Off of the living room is a storage room with laundry facilities and mechanicals for the unit. The eat-in kitchen is finished with neutral wood cabinetry topped in granite along with a stainless refrigerator, stainless undermount sink and a gas range. The kitchen also features a tile floor and backsplash, and the dining area includes bench seating with built-in storage. Access a rear deck from this level that provides a spot for a café table or chaise. There is a bedroom on this level served by a full bath with stall shower and pedestal sink. An upstairs bedroom also has a full bath with a tub/shower. Both bedroom closets include organizers. This is a great opportunity to join one of the city’s most vibrant neighborhoods close to Center City and points west into University City. **Disclaimer BOTH bedrooms do not have carpet anymore. Newly installed vinyl floors in both bedrooms.**

title: Light filled South East Corner Unit on 8th floor!
description:
Light filled South East Corner Unit on 8th floor. One bedroom, one bath, approx 756 sqft. in Bentwood Condominium, historic pre-War elevator bldg. with front desk attendant. Bike room off the lobby. Open Living/dining area w/3 large windows facing East for unobstructed views, bedroom has large windows facing South toward Center City skyline.. High ceiling, central air/heat, exposed brick, wood floors, Kitchen with granite top, pass through window, SS refrigerator, SS dishwasher, garbage disposal, tile bathroom with tub, clothes washer/dryer in unit. Walk everywhere to enjoy all that Center City offers, a world of restaurants, historic & cultural venues, Fashion District Gallery shopping Mall, Reading Terminal Market, Convention Center, & business district. Convenient to Jefferson University & Pennsylvania hospitals, T. Univ. Podiatry School & shuttle bus to main campus, easy access to public transit, major highways, Ben Franklin Bridge. Requires First month rent, last month rent and security deposit, $40 non-refundable credit & background report, $200 move in/out fee. Tenant pays electric, renter insurance, WiFi/Cable/Internet. No Airbnb.
1010 Race St #8L

description:
gorgeous unit boasts an open layout with a large kitchen featuring plenty of cabinet and countertop space, a bright and airy living room, and a huge bedroom. The kitchen is the heart of this home and is decked out with two-tone UltraCraft cabinets, pure white quartz countertops, Delta Trinsic matte black fixtures, and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, making it a chef's dream come true. Modern conveniences such as smart thermostats and Latch Technology secured front entry systems are included in all residences, providing an added layer of security and convenience. The building also features an incredible rooftop deck for all residents to enjoy, a private trash/recycling room, bike storage, and a mail room.

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!
1343 Fitzwater St #301

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, Free People, Paper Source, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Vince, Pandora, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack, and Target. Enjoy a churro sundae at El Merkury. Buy a scone from the Bakeshop on 20th. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Check out Disney100: The Exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!

Rittenhouse Claridge

Welcome home!
